import { FaChartLine, FaChartPie, FaHistory } from "react-icons/fa"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { getAuthUser } from "../../utils/auth"; const ClientDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const user = getAuthUser(); return (
{/* Welcome Banner */}

Welcome, {user?.name}

Manage predictions, review your history, and explore insights from your climate results.

Predict. Welcome, Protect.

Smarter insights to anticipate extreme weather and protect communities across Sri Lanka

{/* Cards Grid (scalable) */}
{/* Card 1 */}
Action
Make a Prediction

Generate a new climate prediction using the latest model inputs and parameters.

{/* Card 2 */}
Records
Prediction History

View previous predictions, compare trends, and track results over time.

{/* Card 3 (Professional placeholder for future features) */}
Insights
Insights & Trends

Explore charts and summaries from your prediction data. (Feature coming soon)

); }; export default ClientDashboard;
